cause.description:
Vegans are those enlightened individuals who realize that animal cruelty happens all around us and understand that going vegan is good for: 1. Us as individuals 2. Us as a society 3. The environment ...because it can stop world hunger, end cruelty, and more. Search the internet for reasons to go vegan. You might be shocked at what you find out.
1. Going vegan is good for us as individuals and as humanity, and the environment
cause.name: I AM VEGAN
